text: Raúl Hernán Villalba (born 9 February 1989), is a Paraguayan professional footballer who plays for Club Agropecuario Argentino as a midfielder.http://d10.paraguay.com/el-mudo-villalba-llega-al-pais-sumarse- olimpia-n633112El ex Newell’s Hernán Villalba jugará la próxima temporada en el Agropecuario‚ viapais.com.ar, 2 August 2017 ==Career== Villalba has played with Newell's Old Boys for his entire football career. Despite being born and raised in Argentina, Villalba was called up and debuted for the Paraguay national football team in a 1-0 loss against Peru, in October 2015. He was eligible to represent Paraguay through his parents, who are of Paraguayan descent. == Honours == ;Newell's Old Boys *Argentine Primera División 2012-13 ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Rosario, Santa Fe Category:Paraguayan footballers Category:Paraguay international footballers Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine people of Paraguayan descent Category:Paraguayan Primera División players Category:Newell's Old Boys footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Hernán Villalba
